name: express-authorshaven
description: A Social platform for the creative at heart

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing npm run dropTables && NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-migrate && npm run db-seed && NODE_ENV=testing nyc --reporter=text --reporter=html --require @babel/polyfill --require @babel/register mocha ./src/tests/*  --timeout 200000 --exit
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test  && npm run coveralls-coverage
scripts.create-db: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name users --attributes firstName:string,lastName:string,email:string,password:string,isVerified:string,signupType:string && sequelize db:migrate
scripts.create-db-trip: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name trips --attributes email:string,location:string,reason:string,tripType:string,status:string && sequelize db:migrate
scripts.create-db-locations: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name locations --attributes names:string && sequelize db:migrate

author: Andela Simulations Programme
